analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The reverse order of the law of conditionality, The Paṭṭhāna text with the Tikas

original: 23.22. Upādinnattika, Kusalattika🔽Naanupādinnupādāniyaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anupādinnupādāniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.🔽Naanupādinnupādāniyaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anupādinnupādāniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: upādinna ttika kusala ttika  na anupādinnupādāniyam na kusalam dhammam paccayā anupādinnupādāniyaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe avigate cha  na anupādinnupādāniyam na akusalam dhammam paccayā anupādinnupādāniyaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: The section on the conjoined, the section on the wholesome🔽With an object that is neither clung to nor a condition for clinging, a wholesome object arises as a condition, by way of a root cause condition. (Abbreviated.) In the root cause condition there are six. … In the unobscured condition there are six.🔽With an object that is neither clung to nor a condition for clinging, an unwholesome object arises as a condition, by way of a root cause condition. (Abbreviated.) In the root cause condition there are three. … In the unobscured condition there are three.

original: Naupādinnupādāniyaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na aupādinnupādāniyam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate pañca
translated: With an object that is neither clung to nor a condition for clinging, an indeterminate object arises as a condition, by way of a root cause condition. (Abbreviated.) In the root cause condition there are five. In the predominance condition there are five. … In the unobscured condition there are five.
